incompatibleConstraints.info: Pathfinding failed due to some constraints. Here you will find the list of constraints that failed on the shortest path, with for each, the type of constraint, the position of the start of the failure zone relative to the start of the path, and its length.

pathfindingErrors.not_enough_path_items: Missing parameters for pathfinding: Departure, Arrival, Rolling stock

warningMessages.marginsAndPowerRestrictionsReset: Margins and power restrictions have been reset.
